attributes.action: Sack Hazel Blears and ask the police to prosecute her for tax evasion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is the belief of the public, many of whom have lost their jobs or under the threat of losing their jobs, that although mp's think they have acted within the law. this is a law which they created for themselves to be able to rob the public of as much money as they can. It is our belief that although ms blears may have acted within the rules of the house of commons she actually broke the laws of the land on tax evasion.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
